turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I need to order some pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to get three small pizzas. One, I want to do as a meat lovers. Another one, a barbecue chicken. And another The last one, Italian sausage and banana peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small pizzas, 1 meatlovers, 1 bbq chicken, and 1 italian sausage and banana peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct. Can I also add extra cheese to all of them?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, please note that bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $45, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
